hero.subtitle: Open the doors to health and well-being! Join an international movement where every day is a step towards success!

about.title: About Coral Club
about.subtitle: Coral Club is an international company that has been helping people improve their quality of life for over 25 years through access to innovative health products and modern wellness technologies.
about.mission_text_1: We believe that everyone deserves a healthy and fulfilling life. Our goal is to provide access to quality products and knowledge that help achieve optimal health.
about.mission_text_2: Coral Club combines science, nature, and innovation to create products that truly work and benefit people worldwide.
about.achievement_1_desc: Over two decades of successful work in the health industry
about.achievement_2_desc: Trust from people around the world confirms the quality of our products
about.achievement_3_desc: Representative offices in dozens of countries
about.achievement_4_desc: A comprehensive approach to improving the quality of life

products.title: Products for a full life
products.subtitle: A range of quality health solutions with natural ingredients
products.product_1_desc: Colo-Vada and Coral Detox for cleansing the body
products.product_2_desc: Complete nutrition for an active life
products.product_3_desc: Parashield Plus and Immunity Pack for strong health

benefits.title: Key Benefits of Cooperation
benefits.subtitle: Join an international movement and discover new opportunities for growth
benefits.benefit_1_desc: Over 25 years on the market of wellness products with a proven reputation
benefits.benefit_2_desc: Detox programs, vitamins, enzymes, and unique products like Coral-Mine.
benefits.benefit_3_desc: 20% discount for club members and loyalty programs
benefits.benefit_4_desc: Training materials, seminars, and consultations from specialists
benefits.benefit_5_desc: Effective growth programs and long-term projects
benefits.benefit_6_desc: Free registration with no obligations or complicated procedures

testimonials.title: Testimonials from our partners
testimonials.subtitle: Real success stories from people who have changed their lives with Coral Club
testimonials.testimonial_1_text: Partnership with Coral Club allowed me to achieve goals like stable passive income and the ability to help other people. The company's products truly change the quality of life!
testimonials.testimonial_2_text: The Colo-Vada program changed my approach to detox. Now I not only help clients but also recommend products that really work!
testimonials.testimonial_3_name: Alina Ermolova | Master of Sports, International Class. Two-time European champion
testimonials.testimonial_3_text: As a sportsperson, I really appreciate the lightness and wonderful state that the right water gives me.
testimonials.testimonial_4_text: I always wanted more: a personal car, a big house, world travels. All this became possible with Coral Club. My amazing results attracted the attention of family and friends. I quickly became a Master, and then my niece did. My success is the success of my team and the help of my mentors.
testimonials.testimonial_5_text: This business is better than a linear one: no need to invest money, pay for rent, delivery, and other costs. Here there are mentors, support, and ready-made actions. It's very interesting to grow quickly. It turned out that large sums are earned more easily than it seemed.
testimonials.testimonial_6_text: Coral Club gave me the opportunity to combine work with caring for my family. A flexible schedule and great team support are what a modern mom needs!
